data.text: @MothershipSG Theit genitals should have been eaten by dogs as punishment. Return punishment.
@MothershipSG Again, why are we accepting people from a country like this as PRs whom can't even speak english???
@MothershipSG Only in China… Utterly barbaric! Who the hell enters your home when you’re out on quarantine!? Urgh!
@MothershipSG This is why they can't achieve Covid-zero. It's karma for the way they treat animals.
@MothershipSG Even you have CCP bandits ruling the place what good do you expect to come out from  the brainwashed people. Definitely the darkest hour in human’s history.

@MothershipSG this happened months ago. hundreds of thousands of citizens spoke out againts it. the people involved were arrested, fined and fired. new policies implemented. Not every chinese person thinks like this about pets and animals. stop acting like the west is a moral compass 😂
